ModMetaData.name: No Water Raids
ModMetaData.author: Laureeeeeeeeeeeeeeen
ModMetaData.description:
Disables emerge from water raid entry method. Works for both mechanoids and devourers. If you don't have Anomaly it will throw an error at startup that you can ignore but still disables mechanoids emerging from the ocean.
Load after any mod which adds new incidents/raids.
